Wisdom: إِخْلَاصُ الْعَمَلِ مِنْ قُوَّةِ الْيَقِينِ وَصَلَاحِ النِّيَّةِ
enWisdom: Sincerity in action stems from strong faith and righteous intention

Wisdom: قَبِيحُ عَاقِلٍ خَيْرٌ مِنْ حَسَنِ جَاهِلٍ
enWisdom: The ugly act of an intelligent person is better than the beautiful act of an ignorant person

Wisdom: عَلَى قَدْرِ الْعَقْلِ تَكُونُ الطَّاعَةُ
enWisdom: Obedience is proportionate to [one’s] intellect

Wisdom: الْعَامِلُ بِالْعِلْمِ كَالسَّائِرِ عَلَى الطَّرِيقِ الْوَاضِحِ
enWisdom: The one who acts with knowledge is like one who travels on the clear path

Wisdom: الْعَمَلُ بِلَا عِلْمٍ [بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ‏] ضَلَالٌ
enWisdom: Action without knowledge is misguidance

Wisdom: لَنْ يَصْفُوَ الْعَمَلُ حَتَّى يَصِحَّ الْعِلْمُ
enWisdom: Action will never become pure until knowledge becomes sound

Wisdom: لَنْ يَزْكُوَ الْعَمَلُ حَتَّى يُقَارِنَهُ الْعِلْمُ
enWisdom: Action will never be pure unless it is accompanied by knowledge

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي الْعَمَلِ بِلَا عِلْمٍ
enWisdom: Action without knowledge is misguidance

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي الْعَمَلِ إِلَّا مَعَ الْعِلْمِ
enWisdom: There is no good in action except with knowledge

Wisdom: يَسِيرُ الْمَعْرِفَةِ يُوجِبُ فَسَادَ الْعَمَلِ
enWisdom: The smallest amount of cognizance leads to corruption of one’s actions

Wisdom: رَوِّ قَبْلَ الْعَمَلِ تَنْجُ مِنَ الزَّلَلِ
enWisdom: Deliberate before acting and you will be saved from error

Wisdom: قَدِّرْ ثُمَّ اقْطَعْ وَفَكِّرْ ثُمَّ انْطِقْ وَتَبَيَّنْ ثُمَّ اعْمَلْ
enWisdom: Measure and then cut, think and then speak, verify and then act

Wisdom: مَنْ فَكَّرَ قَبْلَ الْعَمَلِ كَثُرَ صَوَابُهُ
enWisdom: One who thinks before acting, his accuracy increases

Wisdom: فِكْرُكَ [ذِكْرُكَ‏] فِي الطَّاعَةِ يَدْعُوكَ إِلَى الْعَمَلِ بِهَا
enWisdom: Your thinking about worship prompts you to act upon it

Wisdom: ضَلَّةُ الرَّأْيِ تُفْسِدُ الْمَقَاصِدَ
enWisdom: Misguided opinion corrupts the goals

Wisdom: الْعَاقِلُ مَنْ وَقَفَ حَيْثُ عَرَفَ
enWisdom: The intelligent person is one who stops at what he knows

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُوقِنْ قَلْبُهُ لَمْ يُطِعْهُ عَمَلُهُ
enWisdom: One whose heart does not have certitude, his actions do not submit to it

Wisdom: الطُّمَأْنِينَةُ قَبْلَ الْخِبْرَةِ خِلَافُ [ضِدُّ] الْحَزْمِ
enWisdom: Tranquillity before [gaining] awareness [of the situation] is contrary to judiciousness

Wisdom: رُبَّ دَائِبٍ مُضَيِّعٌ
enWisdom: Many a diligent person also loses [or causes loss]

Wisdom: رُبَّ سَاعٍ فِيمَا يَضُرُّهُ
enWisdom: for that which will harm him
